#include <iostream>
#include <utility>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	long long int i,T,N,B,D;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--){
		cin>>N>>B>>D;
		pair<long long int,long long int>d[D];
		for(i=0;i<D;i++){
			cin>>d[i].first>>d[i].second;
		}
		for(i=D-1;i>=0;i--){
			if(B>=d[i].first){
				B=B+(d[i].second-d[i].first+1);
			}
		}
		if(B>N){
			cout<<-1<<endl;
		}
		else{
			cout<<B<<endl;
		}
	}
	}
